import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { employeeDetail } from "../action/employeeAction"; export default function EmployeeDetail() { const selector = useSelector(state=>state.employeeDetail) const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(employeeDetail()) }, []) console.log(selector); return ( <>

THÔNG TIN CÁ NHÂN

Mã nhân viên : {selector?.code}
